parameters.name: maxSentenceLength
parameters.description: Maximum length (in words) of each sentence in the input data. Any sentence longer than this threshold will be divided into chunks up to the size (> 0)

parameters.name: minCount
parameters.description: the minimum number of times a token must appear to be included in the word2vec model's vocabulary (>= 0)

parameters.name: numPartitions
parameters.description: number of partitions for sentences of words (> 0)

parameters.name: stepSize
parameters.description: Step size to be used for each iteration of optimization (> 0)

parameters.name: vectorSize
parameters.description: the dimension of codes after transforming from words (> 0)

parameters.name: windowSize
parameters.description: the window size (context words from [-window, window]) (> 0)
